comments_since_last_sample.body: Close family friends own a fancy restaurant on the lake, whenever we dine there, which isn't often they refuse to let us pay. So we leave a hefty tip for the staff.

This, I have an old family friend who was my barber growing up, until I moved away from my home town. Now, every time I go home for the holidays I make an appointment to get my hair cut by him. He always tries to give me a free haircut, but I insist on paying him, because he does a better job than most of the places I've found in my new city, and I thoroughly enjoy my time in his chair.
